metadata.title: CVE-2016-0807 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The get_build_id function in elf_utils.cpp in Debuggerd in Android 6.xbefore 2016-02-01 allows attackers to gain privileges via a craftedapplication that mishandles a Desc Size element in an ELF Note, akainternal bug 25187394.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
